products.name: Suzuki GSXR
products.meta: Experience the exhilaration of the 2012 Suzuki GSXR 1000cc with a 6-speed transmission, a true icon in the super sports motorcycle category. Unleash the power, precision, and speed of this legendary machine

products.name: Yamaha R1
products.meta: Experience the remarkable power and precision of the 2012 Yamaha YZF-R1 Crossplane. With its innovative crossplane crankshaft technology, this superbike delivers unrivaled performance and a thrilling riding experience.

products.name: Triumph Triple R
products.meta: Discover the 2012 Triumph Triple R, a remarkable standard category motorcycle known for its versatile performance and timeless style. Ride with confidence and precision on this iconic machine, and experience the perfect blend of power and elegance.
